pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graphical Extension with Accuracy in Parameter Estimation (GAIPE) // Implements graphical extension with accuracy in parameter estimation (AIPE) on RMSEA for sample size planning in structural equation modeling based on Lin, T.-Z. Weng, L.-J. (2014) doi: 10.1080/10705511.2014.915380. And, it can also implement AIPE on RMSEA and power analysis on RMSEA.
